abstract: The Westchester Crossword Puzzle Tournament is this Friday.
snippet: The Westchester Crossword Puzzle Tournament is this Friday.
lead_paragraph: This Friday, Sept. 25, will be the 13th annual Westchester Crossword Puzzle Tournament, held in Pleasantville, NY, hosted by Will Shortz. The event will go from 7:30 to about 9:45 p.m., at the St. John’s Episcopal Church, 8 Sunnyside Ave. (corner of Bedford Road). See map or directions.
